channel.title: Need help making a hamachi server!
channel.description:
I know this sounds dumb....and like a noob question but....how do you make a hamachi server??? :confused:I've always wanted to be the owner of a private server so if you can help me please reply. :)
Thank You. :P

item.title: Need help making a hamachi server!

item.description:

How do i make like the things under the name of the server that says the ip?

u dont need an IP for ham… cause ur IP is ur servers IP… it will show the IP when you create a network

item.title: Need help making a hamachi server!
item.dc:creator: @mopar_I mopar I
item.description:
@mopar_I wrote:

Ok thanks guys but do you guys know how to get a no-ip server?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 07, 2007, 05:31:24 PM[/size][hr]O yeah and when you make the ham server, where do you put in the ip number? all it says is to put in the network name and pass

Read full topic
item.source: Need help making a hamachi server!

item.title: Need help making a hamachi server!
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

zammyking111:

Easy all you do is click the little traingle and click create and name your server what you want and put your network pass word and they type your ip to join you on hamachi

yeah highly simple. Download the hamachi client from: http://hamachi.cc then go throught the tutiroal and the number that should look similar to 5.101.49.244 or something to the standard thats your ip then go to the triangle (as he said) then create a network and a password eg. ham name: Thaisworld5 ham pass:123 if you don’t want to even bother i will host for u

Read full topic
item.source: Need help making a hamachi server!
